definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: There are two kinds of reserviors consisting of clastics and carbonates in Yakela Black.
sentences.chinese: 雅克拉斷凸儲層主要有碎屑岩和碳酸鹽巖兩大類。

sentences.english: These cave systems form in carbonate rock, often on islands.
sentences.chinese: 這些洞穴系統形成碳酸鹽巖，常在島嶼上。

sentences.english: This spring holds the record for being the largest known carbonate-depositing spring in the world.
sentences.chinese: 它是世界上碳酸鹽沉積最多的溫泉。

sentences.english: Sea life makes carbonate shells from this runoff.
sentences.chinese: 海洋生物使碳酸鹽的殼流失。

sentences.english: The Renqui Oil field possesses the biggest carbonate reservoirs in China.
sentences.chinese: 任丘油田是我國最大的碳酸鹽巖油田。

sentences.english: The both sides are carbonate platform, while the middle part shows a deepwater interplatform basin.
sentences.chinese: 兩側爲碳酸鹽臺地，中間爲深水臺盆。

sentences.english: Eodiagenesis is characterized by the assemblage of carbonate-analcime-anhydrite, while authigenic kaolinite is found in some strata.
sentences.chinese: 淺埋藏期以碳酸鹽～沸石～硬石膏組合爲特徵。

sentences.english: Volcanism recycles the carbonates into the atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 火山作用使碳酸鹽重新返回大氣層中。

sentences.english: Many layers of carbonate rock deposition existed in the first member of Shahejie formation in Shanghe area of Huimin sag.
sentences.chinese: 惠民凹陷商河地區沙一段發育多層碳酸鹽巖沉積。

sentences.english: The effect of temperature on corrosion of different carbonatites varies.
sentences.chinese: 溫度對不同的碳酸鹽岩溶蝕的影響各異。

sentences.english: These conclusions show that the depositional environment of carbonate platform in the Ordovician was unstable.
sentences.chinese: 證明了奧陶紀碳酸鹽巖臺地沉積環境是不穩定的。

sentences.english: In addition, the conditions making carbonate rocks as caprocks are also dis- cussed.
sentences.chinese: 另外，還對碳酸鹽巖作蓋層的條件進行了討論。

sentences.english: Ordovician carbonates of Tahe oilfield have been reformed by tectonic movements for many times.
sentences.chinese: 塔河油田奧陶系碳酸鹽巖經歷了多期構造運動的改造。

sentences.english: Late Carboniferous phylloid algal reefs developed on the carbonate platform margin in Ziyun County, Guizhou (South China).
sentences.chinese: 紫雲晚石炭世葉狀藻礁發育在碳酸鹽臺地邊緣。

sentences.english: The micritic carbonate rocks of mechanical origin have mud-debris structure.
sentences.chinese: 機械成因的泥晶碳酸鹽巖則具泥屑結構。

sentences.english: Two reservoir types are detrital reservoir rock and carbonate reservoir rock.
sentences.chinese: 塔東地區儲層類型包括碎屑岩和碳酸鹽巖兩大類。
